entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the evening then changing to rain overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
